thread.title: ESPN: Wilfork to visit with family of Corey Jones before Dolphins-Texans game
thread.title_full: ESPN: Wilfork to visit with family of Corey Jones before Dolphins-Texans game

title: ESPN: Wilfork to visit with family of Corey Jones before Dolphins-Texans game
text:
ESPN: Wilfork to visit with family of Corey Jones before Dolphins-Texans game 
Story by Gary Detman/CBS12MIAMI (CBS12) -- The Miami Dolphins host the Houston Texans Sunday, but the trip to south Florida will be much more than football for one of the Texans.Nose tackle Vince Wilfork is a friend of Corey Jones and, according to ESPN, the lineman plans to visit with the family of the slain musician before the game."Weâ€™re going to continue until we get justice," Wilfork said in an interview with ESPN .A Palm Beach Gardens police officer shot and killed Jones last Sunday while the church drummer waited for a tow truck after his car had a flat tire at 3 a.m , according to investigators. Special Coverage: The Corey Jones Shooting Police said Jones and officer Nouman Raja had a confrontation which led to Raja killing Jones.Raja, dressed in plainclothes, approached the broken-down car while driving an unmarked vehicle. Jones was armed, police said.Benjamin Crump, an attorney for Jones' family, said Raja did not have a badge, Jones did not fire his weapon, and Raja fired six times during the incident, striking Jones three times.Crump, who has taken a number of high-profile and controversial shootings in the last several years, revealed the information after meeting with State Attorney Dave Aronberg Thursday.The Palm Beach County Sheriff's Office is investigating the shooting.Gov. Scott offered the assistance of the Florida Department of Law Enforcement in the wake of numerous calls for an independent investigation into the police shooting.Houston plays at Miami on CBS12 Sunday. Kickoff is at 1 p.m. ESPN: Wilfork to visit with family of Corey Jones before Dolphins-Texans game 
Friday, October 23 2015, 03:07 PM
